Subject: Simon Cook would like to thank all the MKC staff
Body: I am the new boy and I am just so inspired by everyone who is so positive and passionate about our students. There are good times and there are tough times but you are pulling together to see through these and it is awesome to see. I have worked in different colleges but there is something special here we can really achieve together.
